trends: There has been one other sighting in Howard
There were no other sightings in Howard on or around October 2nd 2012
Summary: {dr}last days a silver craft hovered in air
divs: Sighting DetailsFor the last 3 days , a silver craft object hovered in air above my cabin in Howard Colorado. A slight hum as it hovered above treetop near river, then it shot straight up at a high rate of speed until it disappeared in the clouds.It seemed to hover and hum for about 15 minutes as if it was searching for something. I expect it again tomorow
